context_bundle.summary: SOPS is an editor of encrypted files that supports YAML, JSON, TOML, and binary formats with various encryption methods

onboarding.quick_start: echo 'secret_data: value' > secret.yaml && sops --encrypt --kms 'arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:123456789:key/abcd1234' secret.yaml > secret.encrypted.yaml
common_patterns: Git integration: 'git-crypt init && git-crypt add-gpg-user <email>' for repository-wide encryption
Key configuration: .sops.yaml with creation_rules for different key types (KMS, GCP, GPG)
Editor integration: 'export EDITOR=vim && sops file.yaml' for seamless edit/encrypt workflow
known_errors: KMS permission denied: 'aws kms describe-key --key-id <key-arn>' and verify IAM permissions for kms:Encrypt/Decrypt
Invalid MAC: 'sops --updatekeys -y file.yaml' when encryption keys have changed
Git diff noise: 'git diff --ignore-cr-at-eof' and configure .gitattributes for encrypted files
Decryption failed: 'sops --extract <path> file.yaml' to verify specific field encryption
GPG key not found: 'gpg --list-secret-keys' and import required GPG keys with 'gpg --import private.key'
